title: Someone needs to do a thing about this guy :(
body:
This dude threatened to feed and over someone banning his champ by accident,lucky for me someone left the game but i don't  think someone should act this way i think something should be done.
Just saying.

replies.body:
Hey man,

We're glad you pointed this out. What he did in that lobby was not acceptable and is 100% reportable. We've got to keep these kinds of  players in check and force them to own up to their actions, otherwise they'll just continue to spread toxicity and make this a worse place for all of us.

Sadly **Riot** doesn't have a report function for the pre-game lobby so you'll have to send in a support ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure to include the evidence you have and explain the situation thoroughly.

> _**As a side note:**_
> I know you really want to bring this guy to justice, but naming and shaming isn't the right way to do it. It often has nasty side-effects and never really solves the issue at hand.

>  _I'd advise you to take this post down ASAP, otherwise a moderator will._

Thanks for putting the effort in to make this game just a little bit better ;)
